Out of Zi -- on, The per -- fec -- tion of beau -- ty, God hath shined. Out of Zi -- on, The per -- fec -- tion of beau -- ty, God hath shined.

lyrics.stanza: The mighty God, even the Lord, The mighty God, even the Lord, Hath spoken, and called the earth From the rising of the sun Unto the going down thereof.
Out of Zion, The perfection of beauty, God hath shined. Out of Zion, The perfection of beauty, God hath shined.
Our God shall come, He shall come and shall not keep silence; He shall call To the heaven above and to the earth.
Gather my saints Gather my saints together unto me. And the heavens Shall declare His righteousness. Selah.
